stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Choose 2 rezzed pieces of ice. For each chosen piece of ice, gain credits equal to its printed rez cost, then derez it.
text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Choose 2 rezzed pieces of ice. For each chosen piece of ice, gain credits equal to its printed rez cost, then derez it.
title: realloc()
